title: Editorial Policy
description: How we keep content neutral and separate from advertising.
main_html:
Editorial

Editorial Policy

Neutral, checklist-based content. Advertising is separate and clearly labeled.

Funding & advertising

Advertising, when present, is clearly labeled “Advertising” and is visually separate from editorial content.

Rankings

We do not publish rankings and we do not endorse providers.

Corrections

We correct factual errors and clarify unclear statements when identified.

  • How to request a correction: use the Contact page and include the page URL, the statement to correct, and supporting sources.
  • What happens next: we review, update the page if warranted, and note material corrections in this section.
  • Scope: corrections apply to factual content. We do not offer legal or medical advice.

sections.title: Corrections
sections.content: We correct factual errors as soon as we confirm them. Corrections are logged here to preserve accuracy and transparency. This policy applies to both global and city-level educational content. Advertising does not influence corrections.
